strata1.common.utility
Class ReadWriteLockSynchronizer

java.lang.Object
  strata1.common.utility.ReadWriteLockSynchronizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Synchronizer
public class ReadWriteLockSynchronizer
extends Object
implements Synchronizer

Implements the Synchronizer interface by wrapping the standard ReadWriteLock.

Author:
Sapientia Systems
See Also:

Method Detail

lockForReading

public void lockForReading()
Acquires a read lock used in synchronizing concurrent access to objects. A read lock assumes that objects are only read and not modified. This enables multiple readers to access the same object(s) simultaneously without interfering with each other.

Specified by:
lockForReading in interface Synchronizer
See Also:
Synchronizer.unlockFromReading()

lockForWriting

public void lockForWriting()
Acquires a write lock used in synchronizing concurrent access to objects. A write lock assumes that objects are modified and only allows a single writer to be active--no other writers or readers can be active at the same time.

Specified by:
lockForWriting in interface Synchronizer
See Also:
Synchronizer.unlockFromWriting()

unlockFromReading

public void unlockFromReading()
Releases a read lock.

Specified by:
unlockFromReading in interface Synchronizer
See Also:
Synchronizer.lockForReading()

unlockFromWriting

public void unlockFromWriting()
Releases a write lock.

Specified by:
unlockFromWriting in interface Synchronizer
See Also:
Synchronizer.lockForWriting()
